name: The adventures of momo
description:
The Adventures of Momo "Megaman meets metroidvanias"

*small metroidvania levels
*new boss and power each level to progress
*collectathon
*built in game maker studio 2
*Need help with marketing and financing
*pc and consoles
*You can play with control and keyboard
     -The controls in keyboard are Z,X and arrows  

*IM finishing one level, the one you can see in the trailer I want to do 5 levels in total. I have been working on this game for 3 months, so I´ll say it´s in 15 to 20 %*My inspirations are yoshis island, megaman, metroidvanias, hollow knight, banjo kazooie and mario 64

*Im a solo developer. I am an animator located in Mexico 26 years old.
